original_text: And the Lord spake unto Moses in the wilderness of Sinai, in the tabernacle of the congregation, on the first day of the second month, in the second year after they were come out of the land of Egypt, saying,
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 나온 후 둘째 해 둘째 달 첫째 날에 여호와께서 시내 광야 회막에서 모세에게 말씀하여 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And the Lord spake unto Moses
in the tabernacle of the congregation
on the first day of the second month
in the second year after they were come out
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나온 지 이년째 되는 해에
